name: Hexarena
description:
Drive a spaceship and fight online with your friends in this Peer To Peer multiplayer game!

This is an extremely early build that allows us to test the controls and networking. Leave your feedback in the comments!

Controls:

WASD to move forwards, backwards and to the sides

Space and C to move up and down

Q and E to rotate around the ship's forward axis

Mouse to look around

Left Click to shoot

Built with Unity.

Powered by Mirror Networking and Light Reflective Mirror.
